extendedInfo.description: This version is no longer supported but will stay here for historical purposes. A new rewritten version is now available on the Android market.http://market.android.com/details?id=com.epicwindmill.fIRC- - - -fIRC chat is a free IRC client (BETA!)Changelog @ multigesture.net/fircIf you (TMO USA) experience trouble connecting to the server, please use brown.freenode.net or check http://freenode.net/irc_servers.shtml for more serversFixed: onscreen kb layout for myTouch 3G, disabled screen timeout, and hopefully the exit bug.

reviews.comment: Didn\'t work... motorola i1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Above Average...
reviews.comment: Above Average...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I never give one star reviews, but this ap just doesn\'t work. What\'s worse is that it doesn\'t close either.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This used to work, now that i install the app again i just get i/o errors and crashes. I hope the author reads this and fixes this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app is excellent nice easy to use interface also wide server support 5/5 bravo and its free!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps on force closing after which I have to re-enter all my data. Otherwise, it\'s a great client, so PLEASE FIX!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app, but I can\'t connect to the server channel, and the log out and exit button does not function. Nexus One user.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on my droid and connects with my odd servers would be 5 stars if the tab feature was working
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So so poor... i dont see no luck in this chat.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keeps randomly crashing/locking up under donut, which is unfortunate since this irc client seems to have the best overall features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Totally unusable on droid. After connectg to a server and joining a channel there is no window for chat. JUNK.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Unable to use /quote pass challenge makes this useless. Force quit within first few minutes of running
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One of the more usable irc clients with some level of android integration. Weird activity stack behavior though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can only give it 3. Keeps randomly fcing, if not for that it would be perfect
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Forces close when i try to join a channel.. i expected better of a dolphin-emu contributor ;)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: If the /quote pass challenge response doesn\'t work, it\'s a useless app-- just like this one
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Force close. Clumsy UI and lack of encoding(language) support.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I want to like this, but it constantly force closes. Not to mention i cannot connect to any other server without forceclose...moto droid
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Constantly forcecloses for no apparent reason will not stay logged in for more then a few minutes if im not staying in the app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very unreliable. Contantly crashes and forces closed then doesn\'t allow connection again without restarting phone. Very buggy!!
reviews.author: A Google User
